description:
hiori was called over to Yoshihiros place for some intimate pleasures. He leaves in the rush the next morning leaving the key for her.
At work Miki is convinced her cuteness is the reason behind Yoshihiros advances towards her. She tried to fight back, but later she convinces herself that he is doing it because she is so cute that he can’t help but be infatuated with her…
Source: TMDB

titles.title: Excessively Self-conscious and Cheeky Girl Miki: Even Though You Disgraced Me!
La confiance excessive & maladive de Miki
自意識過剰生意気娘・美樹~私に堕ちたくせにっ♥~
